widgets.title: Sales Revenue vs Checkout Response Time
Avg Latency / Log Errors / Span Status Codes
Avg Service Latency by Span Kind

dataprimeQuery.text: source spans | filter $l.subsystemName != null | filter $d.tags['http.status_code'] != null | filter $d.tags['http.status_code'] < 400  | groupby $l.subsystemName as $d['subsystemname'], $d.tags['http.status_code'] as $d['tags.http.status_code'] agg count() as $d['count']

source spans | filter $l.subsystemName != null | filter $d.tags['http.status_code'] != null | filter $d.tags['http.status_code'] > 399  | groupby $l.subsystemName as $d['subsystemname'], $d.tags['http.status_code'] as $d['tags.http.status_code'] agg count() as $d['count']

widgets.title: Service Status Code Count Over Time

dataprimeQuery.text:
source spans 
| lucene '_exists_:serviceName'
| filter arrayContains({{subsystem_name}}, $l.subsystemName)
| filter $d.tags['otel.status_code'] != null 
| groupby $m.timestamp / 20s as $d['timestamp'], $l.serviceName as $d['servicename'], $d.tags['otel.status_code'] as $d['tags.status'] agg count() as $d['count']

source logs 
| filter $m.severity == ERROR || $m.severity == CRITICAL 
| filter arrayContains({{ subsystem_name }}, $l.subsystemname)
| filter $d.message!=null
| countby $l.subsystemname, $d.message into $d.log_count
| orderby $d.log_count desc

source logs 
| filter $m.severity == ERROR || $m.severity == CRITICAL 
//| filter arrayContains({{ subsystem_name }}, $l.subsystemname)
| filter arrayContains({{ service_name }}, service)
| filter $d.message!=null
| countby $l.subsystemname, $d.message into $d.log_count
| orderby $d.log_count desc
